message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $13,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price that still allows me to make a reasonable profit. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $13,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but I can't go any lower than $13,400. This is a fair price for both of us. Let's close this deal!
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
